title: Reasoning Models: When AI Actually Thinks
title_cs: Reasoning Modely: Když AI skutečně přemýšlí
description: Master System 2 AI - learn when and how to deploy models that don't just predict, but reason through complex problems.
description_cs: Ovládněte System 2 AI - naučte se kdy a jak nasadit modely, které nepredikují, ale skutečně uvažují nad složitými problémy.
learning_objectives: Understand the difference between System 1 and System 2 AI
Compare Chain-of-Thought prompting vs Extended Thinking
Know when to use reasoning models vs standard LLMs
Compare GPT-5, Claude Opus 4, o3-pro, and DeepSeek R1
Solve complex logic puzzles using reasoning models
Build multi-file code projects with AI assistance
